titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1851) to reform the housing choice voucher program under section 8 of the United States Housing Act of 1937.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-227, by Ms. Castor.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Financial Services now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 84.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 534.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/12/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1851 (Section 8 Voucher Reform Act of 2007).
